class.name: PCKReader
class.brief_description: Allows reading the content of a pck file.

method.name: close
method.description: Closes the underlying resources used by this instance.

method.name: file_exists
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the file exists in the loaded pack file. Must be called after [method open].

method.name: get_files
method.description: Returns the list of names of all files in the loaded pack file. Must be called after [method open].

method.name: open
method.description: Opens the pack file at the given [param path] and [param offset] within the file and reads its file list. If the pack file has encrypted contents, you can specify a custom [param key] for decryption. If not supplied, [method open] uses the default encryption key.

method.name: read_file
method.description: Loads the whole content of a file in the loaded pack file into memory and returns it. Must be called after [method open].
